original_text: In Benjamin's army there were 700 men who used their left hands to fight. Each of them could use a sling to throw a stone at a very small thing. They could even hit a hair!
korean_text: 이 모든 백성 중에서 택한 칠백 명은 다 왼손잡이라 물매로 돌을 던지면 조금도 틀림이 없는 자들이더라

sentences.original_text: In Benjamin's army there were 700 men
who used their left hands to fight
Each of them could use a sling
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 각자는 새총을 사용할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: to throw a stone at a very small thing
sentences.korean_translation: 아주 작은 것을 향해 돌멩이를 던질 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They could even hit a hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 심지어 털 한 올도 맞출 수 있었습니다
